title: Elementary Science Competency Development Process Based on a Digital Learning Ecosystem

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science fundamental concepts and practical teaching experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening Competencies in Utilizing Digital Tools for Science Education Content Development and Field Application

learning_goals: Learners can develop three or more science education materials by establishing self-directed learning plans and utilizing digital platforms
Through collaborative knowledge-building among learners, complete one science experiment design project and submit final deliverables
Can improve science education scenarios at least twice by incorporating peer feedback using competency-based assessment rubrics
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
